title: Smart Data Models - Wall schema
description: Information on a given Wall of Buildingã€€(Shape, thickness, wall type, etc.).

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Wall`.

dateObjectCreated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The registration date and time of this item as an object.

dateObjectUpdated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The update date and time of this item as an object.

flagDeleted.description: Property. Flag set when this item is deleted as an object.

jointDirection.description: GeoProperty. Joint Direction of this item and Spatial Objects.

jointSurface.description: GeoProperty. Joint Surface of this item and Spatial Objects.

jointArea.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.  Joint Area of this item and Spatial Objects.

objectName.description: Property. Name of this item as an object.

refArea.description: Relationship.  Reference to the area containing this item.

refBuilding.description: Relationship. Reference to the building containing this item.

refMaterialLayer.description: Relationship. Reference to the materialLayer containing this item.

refOpening.description: Relationship. Reference to the opening containing this item.

refRoom.description: Relationship. Reference to the room containing this item.

refStair.description: Relationship. Reference to the stair containing this item.

surfaceInner.description: GeoProperty. Inner Shape of this item.

surfaceOuter.description: GeoProperty. Outer Shape of this item.

thermalTransmission.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thermal transmission of this item.

thickness.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thickness of this item.

volumetricSpecificHeat.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.  Volumetric specific heat of this item.

wallType.description: Property. Wall type. Enum:'outer, inner, basement.'
